content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
No structures have been successfully created on the map. Multiple recovery attempts to supply or craft a Lab at Position(x=0.5, y=2.5) were made but none resulted in a placed structure. Alternate furnaces encountered at Position(x=5.0, y=5.0) and Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0) were used solely for processing resources and do not represent new constructions.

ERROR TIPS
• Incorrect API usage for entity retrieval
  - When calling get_entities, ensure the correct parameters are provided. Avoid using unsupported keyword arguments (e.g. ‘radius’) or an incorrect number of positional arguments.

• Lab placement and inventory checks
  - Verify that a Lab item is available in the inventory before attempting placement. Ensure that fallback procedures account for an empty result when querying for labs.

• Lab crafting prerequisites
  - Confirm that all required sub-ingredients (such as iron-gear-wheels, electronic-circuits, and copper-cables) are producible from available resources. Check that the necessary processing facilities (e.g. furnaces for smelting iron and copper plates) are effectively integrated into the production chain before initiating lab crafting.

• Safeguarding iterative operations
  - Before iterating over results (for example, filtering labs), validate that the returned value is not None and use an empty list as a fallback when necessary.

NAMESPACE
(No user-defined functions have been identified in the execution steps.)
